marquee.text: Trusted PayPal Service #1 Indonesia - We provide trusted PayPal services and secure payment solutions for every transaction you make, including PayPal Payment Services, PayPal Top Up Services, PayPal Transfer Services, PayPal Balance Filling Services, Credit Card, Skrill, Neteller, Namecheap, LiveChat, Bitcoin, crypto, and TRC20. With high security systems, we ensure that every PayPal service is conducted safely and reliably 24 hours a day.

about.title: Secure and reliable online payment services.
about.services_intro: Trusted PayPal service is a service that helps you conduct online transactions using PayPal without needing to have your own PayPal account or credit card. We provide trusted PayPal services in Indonesia that act as intermediaries to facilitate your payments with guaranteed security. Our PayPal services include PayPal payment services, PayPal top up services, and PayPal transfer services available 24 hours a day.
about.services_availability: All services are available 24/7 with responsive customer support.

intermediary.title: PayPal Intermediary Service
intermediary.description: We act as intermediaries for your PayPal transactions with guaranteed security.

payment.title: PayPal Payment Service
payment.description: Payment services for online transactions using PayPal quickly and securely.

transfer.title: PayPal Transfer Service
transfer.description: Send funds to another PayPal account quickly and securely 24 hours a day.

topup.title: PayPal Top Up Service
topup.description: Easily and reliably top up your PayPal account balance.

features.topup_transfer: Top up, transfer, and transaction intermediary

send.title: Bitcoin Sending Service
send.description: Send Bitcoin to other wallets quickly.

transfer.title: Bitcoin Transfer Service
transfer.description: Transfer Bitcoin between wallets with low fees.

general.title: TRC20 Service
general.description: Transaction services using TRC20 tokens on the TRON network.

transfer.title: TRC20 Transfer Service
transfer.description: Transfer TRC20 tokens with low fees and fast processing.

deposit.title: TRC20 Deposit Service
deposit.description: Securely deposit TRC20 tokens to your account.

withdraw.title: TRC20 Withdrawal Service
withdraw.description: Easily withdraw TRC20 tokens from your account.

transfer.title: Skrill Transfer Service
transfer.description: Quick fund transfers between Skrill accounts.

credit_card.title: Skrill Credit Card
credit_card.description: Skrill virtual credit card services for online shopping.

procedure.title: Transaction Procedure
procedure.description: To use our services, simply contact our team via WhatsApp or LiveChat. We will guide you through the transaction process quickly and securely.

licensing.title: Legality & Licensing
licensing.description: PT Jasa Gudang Indonesia is officially registered and has valid business permits to operate in Indonesia.

additional_info.title: Additional Information
additional_info.description: We have served thousands of customers since 2011 with a high satisfaction rate. Security and trust are our top priorities in every PayPal service transaction.

indonesia.title: Indonesia NIB Document
indonesia.description: Business Identification Number (NIB) issued by the Indonesian government.

tangerang.title: Tangerang NIB Document
tangerang.description: Business Identification Number (NIB) issued by the Tangerang City government.

whatsapp.default_message: Hello JasaPembayaran.com, I would like to consult about PayPal services

trusted_partners.subtitle: We partner with trusted brands to deliver the best service.

security.title: Bank-Standard Security
security.description: Over 12 years of experience handling online payments and purchases with multi-layered security systems. We provide professional guidance to keep your transactions safe from fraud risks, dishonest sellers, and other cyber threats.

response.title: Super Fast Response 24/7
response.description: Orders are processed immediately with an average response time of ±3 minutes. Our professional customer service team is friendly, polite, and ready to assist 24 hours a day from start to finish with international standards.

service.title: International Standard Service
service.description: Our customer service understands the unique needs of each customer. Through rigorous recruitment and training, we deliver friendly, responsive, and professional service with world-class standards and cutting-edge technology.

trust.title: 12+ Years of Proven Trust
trust.description: Trusted by thousands of customers in Indonesia and abroad for over 12 years. Real testimonials and a perfect track record prove our commitment to providing the best service.
